TWinSparkle Properties

Properties
 NameDescription
AppBuildVersion

Represents property AppBuildVersion.

AppcastURL

This property defines the full URL path for the appcast xml file.

AutoCheckForUpdates

Represents property AutoCheckForUpdates.

DLLLoaded

Checks if the DLL is loaded.

DLLPath

The path of the DLL.

LastCheckTime

Represents property LastCheckTime.

OnCanShutDown

Represents property OnCanShutDown.

OnDidFindUpdate

This event is triggered when an update is found.

OnDidNotFindUpdate

This event is triggered when an update is not found.

OnError

This event is triggered when WinSparkle gets an error while it is attempting to check for updates.

OnShutDown

This event is called when the updater closes and the install file is launched.

OnUpdateCancelled

This event is raised when the user closes the window or does not install the update ("Skip/Remind Later").

RegistryPath

Represents property RegistryPath.

UpdateCheckInterval

Represents property UpdateCheckInterval.
